programme.title: Wild India
programme.desc: In India‚Äôs deserts, predators and prey battle each other and the harshest of landscapes for food, water, and breeding rights. Leopards, lions, wolves, foxes and hyenas have adapted to face the brutal challenges of surviving here. Yet every year, extreme drought and searing heat test them to their limits.

programme.title: Wild India
programme.desc: India's monsoon forest is a place of both sanctuary and extremes. From the dry season drought to the monsoon deluge, all must live by the law of the seasons. Whether migrating, raising young or defending against predators, every day is a quest for survival. As the dry season tightens its grip, only the most ingenious and resourceful will endure until the lifesaving rains return.

programme.title: Predator V Prey
programme.desc: A forensic look at how polar bears hunt prey, offering new perspectives on the tactics they use to track, stalk and ambush seals, whales and walruses. We follow a mother fighting to feed her two cubs in the harsh polar extremes, and a young male driven by starvation to tackle enormous prey.

programme.title: Wild Arabia
programme.desc: Discover Saudi Arabia‚Äôs rugged landscapes where wildlife ingeniously adapts to extreme conditions. Amid sun-scorched terrain, creatures endure searing sun, thin air, and toxic gases. Explore bone caves, and marvel at rock art depicting local fauna‚Äîdeadly scorpions, raucous baboons, charming chameleons, and endangered leopards. Their resilience mirrors the harsh beauty of Saudi Arabia‚Äôs environment.

programme.title: Mexico Untamed

programme.title: Trials Of The Wild
programme.desc: Life is risky, and no stage of life is riskier than the very beginning. Most animals are born frail, vulnerable, and with a lot of learning to do. But life doesn't go easy on the newcomers..

programme.title: Trials Of The Wild
programme.desc: A deadly predator is stalking the forests of Costa Rica. No, it's not a jaguar, it's a super organism made up of half a million tiny individuals -- an army ant colony..

programme.title: Snake City: Snakes In The City Venomous Face-Off Compilation
programme.desc: Simon, Sioux, and Mbali split up because the calls keep coming in. Sioux and Mbali face a feisty mamba on their own, while Simon catches a second black mamba solo. Then, Simon teaches Mbali how to bag her first spitting cobra while Sioux focuses on an elusive boomslang. Finally, Simon rescues a huge snake hidden in a shed while Mbali and Sioux contain a feisty, cornered black mamba.

programme.title: Predator Bloodlines
programme.desc: She leads the formidable Sausage Tree Pride, an ensemble of buffalo-slaying huntresses. That is, until the migration crosses their prime domain and they demonstrate ultimate adaptability and switch prey species. But the pride has been compromised after a split-away group left their ranks and now she must muster her troupe to excel at motherhood while male coalitions complicate dynamics all around them.

programme.title: Predator Bloodlines
programme.desc: Identified by her burnt orange gaze, she leads a pride of five closely-related lionesses and their six offspring. But desperate drought and crippling disease push the sisterhood to the absolute brink of survival.

programme.title: The Incredible Dr. Pol: Compilation
programme.desc: Furry, feathered, scaly and sick? Pol Vet will treat anyone who isn‚Äôt human, and sees a variety of rare and unusual creature companions. programme.title: The Incredible Dr. Pol
programme.desc: There‚Äôs no time to waste when the emergency calls come in. programme.title: The Incredible Dr. Pol

programme.desc: The emperors are the largest and strongest of all penguins, living in the coldest, most extreme place on Earth. programme.title: Secrets Of The Penguins
